sentences.en: A sees a teacher nod greatly say: " Illusive. "
sentences.cn: 阿大看看老师点点头说: “ 错觉. ”

sentences.en: He was fond of calling his detractor illiterate, denouncing his scientific theories as illegitimate and illusive.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢把他的恶意批评者称作文盲，公然抨击他的科学理论是非法的，迷惑人的。

sentences.en: I don't wanna hear too much illusive words.
sentences.cn: 我不想听太多虚假的承诺。

sentences.en: I know, fear an obstacle to certain person, to me, it is illusive only.
sentences.cn: 我知道, 惧怕对某些人是障碍, 对我, 它只是幻影.

sentences.en: Illusive Man : And it's up to us to stop them.
sentences.cn: 而我们的工作就是阻止他们.

sentences.en: On other mornings, however, I closed my eyes and prayed for the illusive sweet dreams.
sentences.cn: 然而在另一些清晨, 我却紧闭双眼,祈求着虚假的美梦.

sentences.en: People will find themselves in a mysterious and illusive universe while walking in.
sentences.cn: 建筑内部的空间连续,表现出强烈的流动感,如同步入神秘而梦幻的宇宙空间.

sentences.en: We refuse to partake in the production of illusive advertisements.
sentences.cn: 本公司拒绝承做虚假广告.

words.tran_cn: 错觉的；幻影的；虚假的；产生幻觉的
幻觉，错觉；错误的观念或信仰
魔术师；爱幻想的人；幻觉论者；幻觉派的艺术家
错觉的；幻影的；迷惑人的

trans.tran_cn: 幻影的，错觉的，迷惑人的，虚假的
